WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
40 FOOT S/V PETRA, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, ABANDONING SHIP
IN 34-40N 053-15W. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NORFOLK, INMARSAT-C: 430370670,
TELEX: 127775, PHONE: 757 398 6231, FAX: 757 398 6392,
E-MAIL: D05-SMB-D5CC@USCG.MIL.
